summary: We testified on the U.S. Coast Guard's law enforcement mission challenges before the House Transportation and Infrastructure Committee, Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation. It is based primarily on the following reports: Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Improve Maritime Interdictions Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Address Cutter Maintenance and Workforce Challenges Offshore Patrol Cutter: Coast Guard Should Gain Key Knowledge Before Buying More Ships...
title: Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Address Law Enforcement Mission Challenges
